snippet: The social network said it would overhaul the way it sells ads, and eliminate about half of the existing styles, to simplify the process for marketers.
abstract: Facebook announces that it will overhaul way it sells ads, eliminating about half of existing styles, in order to simplify process for marketers; current prospective advertisers are confronted with 27 types of ads from which to choose.
lead_paragraph: The social network said it would overhaul the way it sells ads, and eliminate about half of the existing styles, to simplify the process for marketers.

headline.seo: Facebook Says It Will Simplify Options for Advertisers
headline.main: Ad Formats at Facebook to Be Fewer
headline.print_headline: Ad Formats At Facebook To Be Fewer
